LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Ultrapart_Arm.label: ultra arm
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Ultrapart_Arm.descr: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this arm a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Ultrapart_Leg.label: ultra leg
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Ultrapart_Leg.descr: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this leg a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Ultrapart_VisualSen: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this visual sensor a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Ultrapart_AudialSen: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this audial sensor a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this heatsink a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Ultrapart_CoolantPu: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this coolant pump a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Ultrapart_Battery.d: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this battery a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_Ultrapart_Reactor.d: Higher plasteel temperance with higher efficiency components grants this reactor a significant advantage over standard issue parts.
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_OrganicCharger.desc: A highly advanced bionic part that allows organics that have this installed to charge. It requires considerable energy itself, leading to faster consumption, and reduces the amount of nutrition absorbed when eating food.
